txt.en: Complete Book VI of \qThe Mines of Moria\q
Dwarves from the Iron Hills, the Iron Garrison, have come to reclaim Moria. They soon learn that the task will not be easy....
The Iron Garrison has begun to establish itself within Moria, reclaiming the ancient realm of Durin's Folk....
Delve deep into the ruined halls of Moria and face the threats that lie within.
Hope stirs in the hearts of the Longbeards as they advance against the many threats of Moria....
The Iron Garrison prepares for war as the evil lurking within Moria turns its gaze toward them....
The courage of the Iron Garrison is tested as it faces the wrath of the Orcs of Moria.
There are worse things in the depths of Moria than just Orcs....
